name: OpenWrt LXC
description: OpenWrt running in an LXC container - a powerful open-source firmware that provides advanced networking capabilities with lower resource overhead than a full VM. Perfect for routing, VPN, and network management tasks.

notes.text: This container requires privileged mode for network interface management and kernel module access.
Access the LuCI web interface at http://container-ip after installation completes.
Use 'openwrt' or 'owrt' command to access the OpenWrt shell environment.
